text: Butterfly Kiss is a 1995 British road drama movie directed by Michael Winterbottom and starring Amanda Plummer, Saskia Reeves, Kathy Jamieson, Lisa Riley, Freda Dowie, Fine Time Fontayne, Katy Murphy, Emily Aston, Ricky Tomlinson. ==Other websites== * * Category:1995 drama movies Category:1995 LGBT movies Category:1990s road movies Category:British drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Winterbottom
title: Butterfly Kiss
